column2: ICAO: WIHL) is an airport which currently serves the city of Cilacap in Central Java. It is located 9 km from the city downtown. There is a small terminal with the large airport name on the roof. The airport resides at an elevation of 21 m (70 ft) above mean sea level. It has one runway designated 13/31 with an asphalt surface measuring 1
column4: 593 ft) in length. Susi Air offers schedule commercial flight to / fro Jakarta from this Airport. Address: Jeruklegi
